author: Brian Turner
method: Place all of the ingredients except the ciabatta and oil into a bowl and mix together gently. To serve, spoon the tuna mixture onto the ciabatta and drizzle with the olive oil.
ingredients: 110g/4oz fresh tuna steak, finely chopped,  ½ lemon, juice only,  ¼ onion, finely chopped,  ¼ red pepper, finely chopped,  sea salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 thick slice ciabatta, toasted,  olive oil, to drizzle
